items.title: Trump says Israel has agreed to conditions for 60-day Gaza ceasefire
items.description: A Hamas official told the BBC the group is "ready and serious" to reach an agreement if it ends the war.

items.title: Ugandan military helicopter crashes and catches fire in Somalia
items.description: Three people on board escaped with burns, but five others are "yet to be accounted for", an official say.

items.title: Ukraine fears increased Russian aggression after US halt of weapons supply
items.description: On Tuesday the White House said that it had cut off some weapons deliveries to Ukraine in order "to put America's interests first".

items.title: Dalai Lama confirms he will have a successor after his death
items.description: The exiled leader of Tibetan Buddhism issues a landmark announcement as he turns 90, ending years of uncertainty.

items.title: Jihadist fighters stage series of attacks on Mali military posts
items.description: Tuesday's attack marks the third major assault on army positions over the past month.
